programme.desc: As prison relationships are strictly forbidden, one inmate risks losing her daughter if she gets caught with her girlfriend. Another inmate gives birth to premature twins, and Officer Leath confronts an inmate who started a fight.

programme.title: Born Behind Bars
programme.desc: Stephanie hopes for the early release that will enable her to bring her daughter home even though she hasn't completed her drug abuse treatment. Then, Ruthanne desperately wants to be reunited with her kids.

programme.title: Born Behind Bars
programme.desc: Stephanie goes to court, hoping for the early release that will let her bring baby home. An inmate nanny risks getting kicked out the Wee Ones program because of her girlfriend. Taylor tries to get prison officials to let her premature babies join her.

programme.title: Born Behind Bars
programme.desc: After Officer Leath cracks down, Sydney fears her daughter Aubree will be taken away. A new pregnant inmate, Donyell, enters the program and is immediately targeted by the mean girls.

programme.title: Born Behind Bars
programme.desc: Jeanie goes into premature labour and is rushed to the hospital. Brandi gets into trouble, and confronts the woman she thinks snitched on her. Stephanie's mother wants baby Abigail to come live with her, but Stephanie resists.

programme.title: Born Behind Bars
programme.desc: Jeanie's son Nollan stops breathing during a routine doctor's visit. Fed up with being a nanny, Maranda moves out of the Wee Ones unit.

programme.desc: Toney and his team respond to Memphis's worst mass murder in more than 15 years.

programme.title: The First 48

programme.title: The First 48
programme.desc: A young man is robbed and killed when he meets up with a girl he just met. A man is murdered outside a football game.

programme.title: The First 48

programme.title: The First 48
programme.desc: Detective Garcia investigates the shooting death of a local homeless man, known for looking after his fellow transient friends, and learns that the victim's commendable behaviour may have instigated his death.

programme.title: The First 48

programme.title: The First 48

programme.title: The First 48

programme.title: I Killed My BFF
